# UD Maltese

Language: [Maltese](../mt/overview/mt-hub.html) (code: `mt`)<br/>
Family: Afro-Asiatic, Semitic

This treebank has been part of Universal Dependencies since the UD v2.2 release.

The following people have contributed to making this treebank part of UD: Daniel Zeman, Martin Popel, Mike Rosner, Vinit Ravishankar.

Repository: [UD_Maltese](https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/UD_Maltese)

License: CC BY-SA 4.0

Genre: nonfiction, news

Questions, comments?
General annotation questions (either Maltese-specific or cross-linguistic) can be raised in the [main UD issue tracker](https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/docs/issues).
You can report bugs in this treebank in the [treebank-specific issue tracker on Github](https://github.com/UniversalDependencies/UD_Maltese/issues).
If you want to collaborate, please contact [zeman&nbsp;(æt)&nbsp;ufal&nbsp;•&nbsp;mff&nbsp;•&nbsp;cuni&nbsp;•&nbsp;cz].

<h2>Tokenization and Word Segmentation</h2>

<ul>
<li>This corpus contains 100 sentences and 2332 tokens.</li>
<li>This corpus contains 365 tokens (16%) that are not followed by a space.</li>
<li>This corpus does not contain words with spaces.</li>
<li>This corpus contains 61 types of words that contain both letters and punctuation. Examples: l-, il-, ta', tal-, f', mill-, b', fl-, fil-, għall-, is-, it-, ma', lill-, tat-, bil-, għat-, t-, d-, id-, mal-, fis-, iż-, jista', s-, tad-, tas-, -il, bis-, fid-, fit-, fix-, mis-, n-, qatta', t', taċ-, tibqa', bl-, bħat-, fir-, għaċ-, imqatta', ir-, iwessa', iċ-, jibqa', jipprattikawl-, lit-, maċ-</li>
</ul>
